name: Possess Object
description: You transfer your mind into an adjacent object, putting your body into a stasis. While possessing the object, you have an awareness and vision of 2 units. If the object has limbs or appendages that could constitute as limbs, it gains a movement speed of 1 unit, otherwise you can only move parts of the object. If the object is destroyed, or you lose concentration, your awareness returns to your body.
charge: The spell can be cast at an object within a moderate (20 unit) distance.
